name: The Dictators' Timelines
tagline: Timelines comparing dictators from the 20th century, using TimelineJS.
body:
### Welcome to The Dictators' Timelines.
I've always been interested in using code to make the art of teaching history more...awesome. This project is a start on that - the idea is to compare the lifetimes of different dictators, using the TimelineJS library, from the fabulous folks at Northwestern University's [Knight Lab](http://knightlab.northwestern.edu/).

Currently, this is a basic Github documentation site, with a timeline embedded in it. In a couple weeks, I intend to build a CMS on top of it, which allows you to add different timelines, dictators, and so on.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
